<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surging Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=1702) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
An ally you can see falls to 0 Hit Points.

</column>

---

When an ally you can see falls in battle, your fight or flight response triggers a surge in your deity's might within you. You instantly regain 1 Focus Point.
name: Surging Focus
